name: Rayifox
description:
Rayifox is a little electric fox that was captured by bad robots.

Your mission: escape and rescue your family.

Features:

-40 levels platform adventure / puzzle style

-Be careful with the traps and bad robots

-Escape, run and defeat the machines with the electric power

Enjoy this platform-style adventure, available to all ages. Don't worry is totally free.

Instructions to play:

1-Touch Screen

2-Keyboard:

  • Right / Left arrow = move

  • Up arrow = Jump

  • B= Power 1

  • N= Power 2

  • Enter = Pausa

3- Gamepad:

  • Right / Left D-pad = move

  • Button A = Jump

  • Button Y = Power 1

  • Button X = Power 2

  • Start = Pausa / menu

  • Button B = Back 

Android version:

Available on Google Play Store

Important: This game has autosave, if you delete the cookies or internet cache will loss the save files.
